Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application ID of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The spark deployment mode of the application.
Columns.Name: SparkDeployMode

Columns.Description: The master mode of the Spark Application
Columns.Name: SparkMaster

Columns.Description: The max number of attempts Yarn will make for the application.
Columns.Name: YarnMaxAttempts

Columns.Description: The number of Spark Executor instances.
Columns.Name: SparkExecutorInstances

Columns.Description: The memory usage of the Spark Executor
Columns.Name: SparkExecutorMemory

Columns.Description: The number of Executor cores.
Columns.Name: SparkExecutorCores

Columns.Description: The YARN tag of the application.
Columns.Name: YarnTags

Columns.Description: The type of YARN queue for the application.
Columns.Name: YarnQueue

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node running the application.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the host.
Columns.Name: Host

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the application.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the application
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
